title: An Extensible Multimodal Multi-task Object Dataset with Materials. (arXiv:2305.14352v1 [cs.CV])
abstract: We present EMMa, an Extensible, Multimodal dataset of Amazon product listings that contains rich Material annotations. It contains more than 2.8 million objects, each with image(s), listing text, mass, price, product ratings, and position in Amazon's product-category taxonomy. We also design a comprehensive taxonomy of 182 physical materials (e.g., Plastic $\rightarrow$ Thermoplastic $\rightarrow$ Acrylic). Objects are annotated with one or more materials from this taxonomy. With the numerous attributes available for each object, we develop a Smart Labeling framework to quickly add new binary labels to all objects with very little manual labeling effort, making the dataset extensible. Each object attribute in our dataset can be included in either the model inputs or outputs, leading to combinatorial possibilities in task configurations. For example, we can train a model to predict the object category from the listing text, or the mass and price from the product listing image. EMMa offe

translated_title: 一种具有材料的多模态多任务可扩展对象数据集
translated_abstract: 我们提出了EMMa，这是一个包含有丰富的材料注释的亚马逊产品列表的可扩展、多模态数据集。它包含超过280万个对象，每个对象都有图像、列表文本、重量、价格、产品评级以及在亚马逊产品分类法中的位置。我们还设计了182种物理材料的综合分类（例如，塑料$\rightarrow$热塑性$\rightarrow$亚克力）。每个对象都用此分类中的一个或多个材料进行注释。我们开发了智能标记框架，以快速将新的二进制标记添加到所有对象中，几乎不需要手动标记，从而使数据集具有可扩展性。数据集中的每个对象属性均可包含在模型输入或输出中，带来了任务配置的组合可能性。例如，我们可以从产品列表文本中训练模型预测对象类别，或者从产品列表图像中预测物质和价格。EMMa为研究社区提供了一个新的精简多模态数据集，有助于推动模型的发展和推广。
tldr: EMMa是一个可扩展、多模态数据集，包含超过280万个带丰富材料注释的亚马逊产品列表对象。这个数据集的可扩展性极强，可以用于多个任务，每个对象属性都可以包含在模型输入或输出中。
en_tdlr: EMMa is an extensible multimodal dataset with more than 2.8 million Amazon product listings objects, each with rich material annotations. It provides a comprehensive taxonomy of 182 physical materials and a smart labeling framework to quickly add new binary labels, making it suitable for various tasks. Each object attribute can be included in the model inputs or outputs, making the dataset highly composable.
